body: pretty good, honestly I think we need more cuckquean girls getting NRT'ed doujins. though I was disappointed  that the author went with the girl being blackmail and rape rather than her just being a cuckquean who likes to get  NRT'ed  6/10

A Good Art, a Good Story of rape, a Good development, a Good start. I hope we can have the continuation of this story but well the author already said that it's hard to draw this one so I dont think we would get continuation. Honestly the story of almost NTR is so far the best story for me.

Again a bunch of idiots thinking it's NTR,
Imagine this Girl A and Girl B likes Boy A but Girl B got to Guy A first.
So what do you think? It's just basically the two of them courting the guy also the Girl A didn't even tell her his feelings so it's not even close to NTR but! It was most likely a "Forced NTR" which I don't really like. So anyways I kinda like this one since Boy B/the side charcter get to own Girl A/Tomoki lol, though it still didn't get me hard, now off to my fapping tags!
That's how it ends? No continue? What!
The chad Iwata should steal Tomoko aswell creating a harem while the cuck hiro rubs himself in the corner crying. Hope there's a sequel
damn i really like this artist
Stupid blackmail and rape again and having a similar story or being close as the author says means jack shit it's still not NTR.
very nice rape doujhin, very good indeed
Man, that blackmail ruins everything as if the NTR (well, even though they're not dating) isn't enough. I rather have the Tomoko and senpai fucking instead of the blackmail one

It would have been better without that dumb blackmail
Equivalent exchange. I don't see any problem here. 🤑🤷‍♂️

I agree with you @Euphorism, it wouldn't have mattered whether she told her feelings to senpai or not. And then, the douche filming shit is again those typical hentai logic, hentai plot devices that are so overused it's becoming retarded. The rest of the story is your typical NTRash, so again we stick with the art and enjoy.
Nah Senpai wouldv’e turned down FMC; but i bet she would still be ok with being a side chick.
